amendment.description: Page 3, lines 20 through 22, strike ".25 percent of the current projected gross domestic product of the United States" and insert "$5,000,000,000".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 112-383 lower the threshold for requiring a dynamic score from .25% of the current GDP to $5 billion.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Flake amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Flake.
